alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 4:59PM MST until February 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow, heavy at times. Also significant blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for the evening commute. Visibility in heavier snow and blowing snow will be around a tenth of mile. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Road closures are possible given expected weather conditions. Before venturing out, motorists should check current road conditions by visiting wyoroad.info or by calling 5 1 1.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water as well as a cell charger in your vehicle in case of an emergency. If you become stranded, stay with your vehicle.
